GLuint eol_shader_load_program ( char *  filenameVertex,
char *  filenameFragment 
)

Loads the specified GLSL vertex and fragment programs.

Parameters:
filenameVertex the filename for the vertex file
filenameFragment the filename for the fragment file
Returns:
0 on error, or the GL id of the loaded shader program.
